name: The Black Lamb
storyline: The Black Lamb is a folklore horror game inspired by eerie childhood tales and real-life events. After a tragic accident, you find yourself drawn to a mysterious black lamb. Following it leads you to an unsettling village—but this is no ordinary village. Dark secrets lurk within, and your only choice is to uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors around you.
